messages.text: Dear Priyanka, I am Ms. Susan from Cloud-Synaptics Inc. We have reviewed your resume on Naukri.com and are highly impressed with your qualifications.
Thank you for reaching out. I'm interested in learning more.
Excellent. We have an immediate opening for a 'Data Annotation Specialist'. It is a fully remote position, 5 hours a day, Monday to Friday. The salary is ₹85,000 per month.
That sounds like a great opportunity. What are the next steps?
Due to the urgent need, we are bypassing the traditional interview process. Based on your resume, our hiring manager has already approved your profile. We would like to offer you the position.
Really? That was fast. I accept!
Congratulations and welcome to the team! We are thrilled to have you. To begin your onboarding, we need to complete a few formalities.
You will be sent an offer letter shortly. In the meantime, we need to arrange your work equipment.
Okay, sounds good.

The company provides a pre-configured high-end laptop and software. For insurance and security purposes, new employees are required to pay a fully refundable security deposit of ₹15,000 for the equipment.
This deposit will be returned to you in your first salary payment. It is a standard company policy.
A deposit? I've never had a job ask for that before.

I understand your concern, but this is a security measure for our high-value assets. We have many candidates waiting for this role, so we need to confirm your position immediately. The payment must be made within the next 2 hours to secure your spot and start the shipment of your laptop.
Where do I send the money?
You can make a direct transfer to our vendor's account. I am sending you the details now. Please send a screenshot of the confirmation.
[Bank Account Details]
I've sent it.
Excellent! Payment received. Your onboarding is almost complete. There is just one final step.
What is that?
We need to activate your employee ID and enrol you in our paid training program. The training fee is a one-time payment of ₹5,000, which is also fully refundable.
Another payment? You didn't mention this.

My apologies, it's a separate department. But this is the final step, I assure you. Once this is done, you are officially an employee and we can schedule your welcome call. Please process this quickly so we can close your file for the day.
This feels a bit strange.

Priyanka, this is a highly sought-after position. We are simply following procedure. If you are not serious, we can offer the position to the next candidate immediately. Please confirm your intention now.
No, I'm serious. I will send it.
